department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil with slit neck opening; red velvet faces neck and armholes; red ground cloth, heavily brocaded upper portion; multicolored geometric patterns on main body and flowers at shoulders; front has white 'dots' in lower section; lower section at back has one row of dots.
markings: Lender\'s info tag, sewn inside back of collar
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
